long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Palette Master: Your Ultimate Color Scheme Generator

Transform your screen into a canvas of endless possibilities with Palette Master, the ultimate Chrome plugin for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts. This powerful tool lets you seamlessly pick any pixel color from your screen and effortlessly generate stunning color schemes to inspire your creativity.

Key Features:

Pixel Color Picker: Click on any pixel on your screen to instantly identify its color. Perfect for capturing colors from images, websites, or any on-screen content.

Color Scheme Generator: Generate a variety of harmonious color schemes based on your chosen color.

User-Friendly Interface: With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, Palette Master makes it simple to select colors and generate palettes, whether you're a seasoned designer or a beginner.

Instant Inspiration: Quickly find the perfect color combinations for your projects, from web design and digital art to branding and interior design.

Unlock the full potential of your creativity with Palette Master. Download now and start creating beautiful color schemes with ease!

Please Note: Due to security reasons the extension may not work on some of Google's pages, especially links starting with Chrome://.
